mean_cn: n. 无能力者；  adj. 无能力的，不胜任的
mean_en: a person who is not able to do something well :an incompetent person
sentence: Don't call us incompetent. We know this is the engine - at least, I think it is.
sentence_trans: 不要说我们无能。我们知道这是引擎，至少我认为它是。
word_etyma: in无 + com共同 + pet追寻，寻求 + ent...的 → incompetent无能的
